info.name: Google: remove preview pane, widen search results
info.description:
This style: 
- removes the preview pane on google search
- widens the search results
- removes "switch to the new look" in gmail
- removes "Click here to start sharing on Google+" on google homepage
- removes +1 buttons in search results when logged in
info.additionalInfo:
20111007: initial version
20111130: removed "switch to the new look" in gmail
20111202: removed "Click here to start sharing on Google+" on google homepage
20111204: removed +1 buttons in search results when logged in
20120820: removed contextual results on google search
